product_overview: Zero Graph is India's leading carbon emissions tracking and management platform for businesses. It offers a comprehensive web application for tracking, reducing, and offsetting carbon footprints with real-time analytics, BRSR compliance automation, and a verified carbon credits marketplace.
core_goals: Enable businesses to accurately track their carbon emissions across Scope 1, 2, and 3.
Automate BRSR (Business Responsibility and Sustainability Reporting) compliance reporting.
Provide tools for businesses to calculate, manage, and offset their carbon footprints.
Offer real-time analytics and 3D data visualizations to improve understanding and decision-making.
Facilitate access to verified carbon credits through a secure marketplace.
Deliver AI-powered insights and recommendations to promote sustainability actions.
Support Indian regulatory compliance including GST validation and state-wise emission factors.
key_features: User Authentication with Email/Password and Google OAuth integration.
An interactive Carbon Emissions Dashboard featuring 3D visualizations like Carbon Molecule and EarthGlobe.
BRSR report generation and management tools for regulatory compliance.
Carbon Calculators tailored for individuals, businesses, and corporate use.
Real-time emissions monitoring including monthly trend charts and recent activity tracking.
Carbon Credit Marketplace for purchasing verified offsets with certification badge displays.
PDF Reports generation using jsPDF and AutoTable libraries.
Sustainability Quiz to engage users and promote awareness.
Consultation booking system integrated into the platform.
Compliance Hub providing regulatory details and support.
State-wise emission factor selection and GST number validation specific to Indian businesses.
Quick action buttons for common user tasks and AI-driven insights.
user_flow_summary: User visits the landing page (Index) to learn about the product benefits, features, testimonials, and calls to action.
New users register via Signup page using email/password or Google OAuth.
Registered users log in and access the Dashboard displaying real-time emissions data with 3D visualizations and actionable insights.
Users navigate to different modules including Emissions Calculators, Reports generation (BRSR), Carbon Credit Marketplace, Compliance Hub, and Consultation Booking.
Users input and track their emissions data categorized by Scope 1, 2, and 3.
Users generate and download detailed compliance reports in PDF format.
Users participate in the Sustainability Quiz to assess awareness and receive recommendations.
Users can access informational content like blogs, certification details, and about pages to deepen understanding.
Quick access features such as recent activity feed and quick actions streamline user interactions.
validation_criteria: User authentication must securely support email/password and Google OAuth sign-in methods with session persistence.
Carbon emissions data visualizations render accurately in real-time with smooth 3D graphics and responsive charts.
BRSR reports generated comply with regulatory requirements and produce correctly formatted PDFs.
Carbon footprint calculators provide accurate calculations for individual, business, and corporate profiles.
Marketplace transactions for carbon credits proceed securely and reflect up-to-date certifications and offsets.
GST validation and state-wise emission factor selection function correctly per Indian regulatory standards.
All interactive components including quizzes, consultations booking, and compliance hubs operate without errors.
System performance maintains responsiveness across devices including mobile with proper UI adaptation.
AI-powered insights generate relevant, actionable sustainability recommendations based on user data.
Automated testing and user acceptance testing confirm seamless flow from login through dashboard to reporting.
